hymn.title: Thy Life was giv'n for me
hymn.chords: | C - - | C. C/E. | F. Dm. | C/G. G7. | C. F/C. | C. C/E. | F. Dm. | C/G. G7. | F/C. C. | G/B. G7. | C. C/E. | Dm. G7. | F/C. C. | Dm. G7. | Am. C/E. | Dm. G7. | F/C. C. |

layout.singingstanza: Thy Life was giv'n for me, Thy blood, O Lord, was shed, That I might ran -- somed be, And quick -- ened from the dead; Thy Life was giv'n for me, for me; What have I giv'n for Thee? Thy Life was giv'n for me, for me; What have I giv'n for Thee?
